title: How to Eat Warm Weet Bix

steps.headline: Buy a Weet Bix bag.
steps.description: Buy a Weet Bix bag if you do not have one.

steps.headline: Get the Weet Bix out.
steps.description: Get a Weet Bix, a plate , milk and a spoon out.

steps.headline: Put it in the microwave.
steps.description: Put the Weet Bix in the microwave. 40-50 seconds is long enough.

steps.headline: Take the Weet Bix out.
steps.description: Get the Weet Bix out of the microwave after that time passes and get start eating.

text: Buy a Weet Bix bag. Buy a Weet Bix bag if you do not have one. Get the Weet Bix out. Get a Weet Bix, a plate , milk and a spoon out. Put it in the microwave. Put the Weet Bix in the microwave. 40-50 seconds is long enough. Take the Weet Bix out. Get the Weet Bix out of the microwave after that time passes and get start eating.
